title: PM discusses with Amb. Nong Rong Sino-Pak matters ahead of China visit
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 31 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday held an in-depth meeting with Chinese ambassador Nong Rong encompassing diverse matters ahead of his two-day official visit to China starting tomorrow.
It was highlighted in the meeting that the visit of Prime Minister Shahbaz Sharif to China would further strengthen trade and economic ties, the PM Office said.
Special Assistant to PM Tariq Fatemi also attended the meeting.
